SELECT searchNo, searchTitle, searchContent, searchRegdate, searchWriter, searchDelYn, tableType FROM (SELECT search.no as searchNo, search.title as searchTitle, search.content as searchContent, search.regdate as searchRegdate, search.writer as searchWriter , search.DelYn as searchDelYn, search.tableType as tableType FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, no,title,content,regdate,writer,DelYn,tableType FROM (SELECT mhf.mhfNo as no, mhf.mhfTitle as title, mhf.mhfContent as content, mhf.mhfRegDate as regdate, mhf.mhfWriter as writer, mhf.mhfDelYn as DelYn, mhf.tableType as tableType FROM mhfind mhf WHERE mhfDelYn = 'N' ORDER BY mhfRegDate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 and 5
UNION ALL
SELECT ROWNUM, no,title,content,regdate,writer,DelYn,tableType FROM (SELECT mhr.mhrNo as no, mhr.mhrTitle as title, mhr.mhrContent as content, mhr.mhrRegDate as regdate, mhr.mhrWriter as writer, mhr.mhrDelYn as DelYn, mhr.tableType as tableType FROM mhreport mhr WHERE mhrDelYn = 'N' ORDER BY mhrRegDate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 and 5
UNION ALL
SELECT ROWNUM, no,title,content,regdate,writer,DelYn,tableType FROM (SELECT mq.mqNo as no, mq.mqTitle as title, mq.mqContent as content, mq.mqRegDate as regdate, mq.mqWriter as writer, mq.mqDelYn as DelYn, mq.tableType as tableType FROM mqna mq WHERE mqDelYn = 'N' ORDER BY mqRegDate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 and 5
UNION ALL
SELECT ROWNUM, no,title,content,regdate,writer,DelYn,tableType FROM (SELECT mpf.mpfNo as no, mpf.mpfTitle as title, mpf. mpfContent as content, mpf.mpfRegDate as regdate, mpf.mpfWriter as writer, mpf.mpfDelYn as DelYn, mpf.tableType as tableType FROM mpfind mpf WHERE mpfDelYn = 'N' ORDER BY mpfRegDate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 and 5
UNION ALL
SELECT ROWNUM, no,title,content,regdate,writer,DelYn,tableType FROM (SELECT mpp.mppNo as no, mpp.mppTitle as title, mpp.mppContent as content, mpp.mppRegDate as regdate, mpp.mppwriter as writer, mpp.mppDelYn as DelYn, mpp.tableType as tableType FROM mpprotect mpp WHERE mppDelYn = 'N' ORDER BY mppRegDate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 and 5
UNION ALL
SELECT ROWNUM, no,title,content,regdate,writer,DelYn,tableType FROM (SELECT mpr.mprNo as no, mpr.mprTitle as title, mpr.mprContent as content, mpr.mprRegDate as regdate, mpr.mprWriter as writer, mpr.mprDelYn as DelYn, mpr.tableType as tableType FROM mpreport mpr WHERE mprDelYn = 'N' ORDER BY mprRegDate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 and 5
UNION ALL
SELECT ROWNUM, no,title,content,regdate,writer,DelYn,tableType FROM ( SELECT mn.mnNo as no, mn.mnTitle as title, mn.mnContent as content, mn.mnRegDate as regdate, mn.mnWriter as writer, mn.mnDelYn as DelYn, mn.tableType as tableType FROM mnotice mn WHERE mnDelYn = 'N' ORDER BY mnRegDate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 and 5 ORDER BY tableType DESC, regdate DESC) search) WHERE searchTitle LIKE '%'||#{uSearch}||'%' OR searchContent LIKE '%'||#{uSearch}||'%'
